moves.1. e4:
This is a game from my childhood. I play as black and make many instructive mistakes in the game. I also make some good moves which are worth analysing.

The end is like a problem finish - Find the best move.

I have added a few questions at specific points in the game to challenge the reader to think and discuss.

If anyone leaves behind their comments/queries, I will respond..
moves.1... c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 d6: What else do you think are black's alternatives here?
moves.12. Nxf6+ Bxf6 13. Be3 Be6 14. Rd1 Be7 1: Is this a sound move by Black?
moves.16. Bh6 Rf7: Compare Rg7 vs Rf6 for Black. Which one is better?
moves.17. exf5 Bxf5 18. Bc4 Qc7 19. Bxf7+ Kxf7: What is the best move for Black here?
moves.26. f5 Bf7 27. Rcd1 Qc6 28. fxg6 Bxg6 29: What should Black move here to Win??

gameName: Game to be used for Teaching
